scripts.build-scummvm: cd scummvm && ./dists/emscripten/build.sh build --enable-release --enable-plugins --disable-all-engines --enable-engine=testbed,playground3d,scumm, --default-dynamic --enable-png --enable-ogg --enable-vorbis --enable-gif --enable-mpeg2 --enable-freetype2 --enable-jpeg --enable-theoradec --enable-mad --enable-zlib && cp build-emscripten/scummvm.html build-emscripten/index.html && cp AUTHORS build-emscripten/ && cp COPYING build-emscripten/ && cp LICENSES/* build-emscripten/ && cp COPYRIGHT build-emscripten/ && cp NEWS* build-emscripten/ && cp README* build-emscripten/
scripts.detect-games: npm run refresh-data-index && cd scummvm/build-emscripten && node ../../scripts/detect-games.js
